mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.CmnsVrtyMapper.selectCmnsVrty */ VC.ITEM_CD , VC.VRTY_CD , VC.VRTY_NM , VC.DEL_YN FROM TB_VRTY_CRTR VC WHERE VC.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} AND VC.VRTY_CD = #{vrtyCd}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.CmnsVrtyMapper.selectApcVrty */ AVC.APC_CD AS APC_CD , AVC.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , AVC.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , AVC.VRTY_NM AS VRTY_NM , AVC.UNIT_WGHT AS UNIT_WGHT , AVC.WGHT_RKNG_SE_CD AS WGHT_RKNG_SE_CD , AVC.NH_APC_CD AS NH_APC_CD , AVC.NH_VRTY_NM AS NH_VRTY_NM , AVC.SN AS SN , AVC.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_APC_VRTY_CRTR AVC WHERE AVC.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} AND AVC.VRTY_CD = #{vrtyCd} AND AVC.APC_CD = #{apcCd}
AND AVC.EXTRNL_LNKG_CD = #{extrnlLnkgCd}
